tasks.label: Rebuild and Run Server
tasks.command: taskkill /F /IM Server.exe 2>$null; dotnet build src/Server/Server.csproj; dotnet run --project src/Server/Server.csproj

tasks.label: Fix Collation and Update Database
tasks.command: sqlcmd -S localhost -d LamaMedellin -E -i 'src\Server\Scripts\FixCollation.sql'; cd src\Server; dotnet ef migrations add UpdateMiembroModelWithUTF8Support; dotnet ef database update; cd ..\..;  dotnet build src\Server\Server.csproj

tasks.label: Verify Members Data
tasks.command: sqlcmd -S localhost -d LamaMedellin -E -Q "SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalMiembros FROM Miembros; SELECT TOP 5 NumeroSocio, NombreCompleto, Apellidos FROM Miembros ORDER BY NumeroSocio"

tasks.label: Build and Run Modern UI
tasks.command: dotnet build src\Server\Server.csproj; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { dotnet run --project src\Server\Server.csproj }
